title: Unlocking camera COMPUTER DESTROYER +control + e bug.
body: I'm having this problem whenever i unlock my camera and try to log it back in, it freezes my computer and dc's me, ill need to restart my computer then. Also pressing control e doesnt lvl up my e, but it works on q,w,r. rito pls fix.

replies.body:
It sounds like some of these issues could be caused by some corrupt or missing settings inside your input or game config files. The steps below will assist you in resetting these and may potentially fix most if not all of your problems.

First,  **log into the game** then jump into **a custom match**. *Alt+Tab* out of the match, then navigate to your config folder, which should be in your install directory:

**C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config**

>Delete these two files:
**- input.ini**
>**- PersistedSettings.json**

Once you've deleted those files, leave the current match, then hop into a fresh one to confirm the changes went through. Let me know if you have any questions or if your issue(s) persist.

Try the repair thing on ingame log in.
Worst comes to worse just uninstall game an reinstall should take 10-20mins
